Package com.attivio.sdk.scanner.concurrency

Interface ConcurrentScannerThrottlingAware

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConcurrentDocumentFetcherScanner
    public interface ConcurrentScannerThrottlingAware
extends ConcurrentDocumentFetcherScanner
    The scanner will implement this to if it wants platform level throttling support. It extends ConcurrentDocumentFetcherScanner since throttling is needed only when multiple threads try to access the server concurrently.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.attivio.sdk.scanner.concurrency.ConcurrentDocumentFetcherScanner

        FetcherTimeoutDefault, ThreadpoolSizeDefault
